abstract: Netflix isn’t paying any money to get its video onto TiVo recorders, but other content deals are more complicated.
snippet: Netflix isn’t paying any money to get its video onto TiVo recorders, but other content deals are more complicated.
lead_paragraph: Let me add an interesting tidbit to the coverage of Netflix’s deal to put its Internet movies on TiVo video recorders, which is similar to Netflix’s previous deals with Samsung, LG, Microsoft and others.

headline.main: The Economics of the TiVo-Netflix Deal
